Effect.Name: Remove Magic
Effect.Description: Attempts to remove one random non-permanent magic effect on the target.

Effect.Name: Remove All Magic
Effect.Description: Attempts to remove all the non-permanent magic effects on the target.

Effect.Name: Immunity to Effect
Effect.Description: Causes target to be immune to another effect.

Effect.Name: Temporary HP
Effect.Description: Grants temporary health points.

Effect.Name: HP Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to health points.

Effect.Name: SP Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to stamina points.

Effect.Name: MP Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to magic points.

Effect.Name: Heal HP
Effect.Description: Heal health points.

Effect.Name: Heal SP
Effect.Description: Heal stamina points.

Effect.Name: Heal MP
Effect.Description: Heal magic points.

Effect.Name: HP Regen
Effect.Description: Regeneration of health points.

Effect.Name: SP Regen
Effect.Description: Regeneration of stamina points.

Effect.Name: MP Regen
Effect.Description: Regeneration of magic points.

Effect.Name: Drain HP
Effect.Description: Drain health points from target.

Effect.Name: Drain SP
Effect.Description: Drain stamina points from target.

Effect.Name: Drain MP
Effect.Description: Drain magic points from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Strenth
Effect.Description: Drain strength from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Vitality
Effect.Description: Drain vitality from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Dexterity
Effect.Description: Drain dexterity from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Speed
Effect.Description: Drain speed from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Intelligence
Effect.Description: Drain intelligence from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Wisdom
Effect.Description: Drain wisdom from target.

Effect.Name: Absorb Charisma
Effect.Description: Drain charisma from target.

Effect.Name: raisedead
Effect.Description: Raises dead targets to life.

Effect.Name: Weight Allowance Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus to the amount a character can carry.

Effect.Name: Give XP
Effect.Description: Give character experience points.

Effect.Name: Extra Attacks
Effect.Description: A chance to do extra attacks in combat.

Effect.Name: Extra Offhand Attacks
Effect.Description: A chance to do extra off-hand attacks for those that dual-wield in combat.

Effect.Name: Armor Class
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to armor class.

Effect.Name: Initiative Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to initiative.

Effect.Name: Fortitude Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to fortitude.

Effect.Name: Reflex Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to reflex.

Effect.Name: Willpower Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to willpower.

Effect.Name: Strength Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to strength.

Effect.Name: Vitality Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to vitality.

Effect.Name: Dexterity Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to dexterity.

Effect.Name: Speed Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to speed.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to intelligence.

Effect.Name: Wisdom Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to wisdom.

Effect.Name: Charisma Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to charisma.

Effect.Name: Virtue Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to virtue.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the crossbows skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the hand-to-hand combat skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the climbing skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the swimming skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the jumping skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the ambidexterity skill.

Effect.Name: Parry Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the parry skill.

Effect.Name: Disable Traps Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the disable traps skill.

Effect.Name: Lockpick Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the lock picking skill.

Effect.Name: Sneak Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the sneaking skill.

Effect.Name: Pickpocket Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the pick pocketing skill.

Effect.Name: Perform Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the perform skill used by bards.

Effect.Name: Ddeathstrike Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the deathstrike skill used by assassins.

Effect.Name: History Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the history skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the mythology skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the artifacts skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the diplomacy skill.

Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the bartering skill.

Effect.Name: Scouting Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the scouting skill.

Effect.Name: Alchemy Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the alchemy crafting skill.

Effect.Name: Enchanting Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the enchanting crafting skill.

Effect.Name: Blacksmithing Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the blacksmithing crafting skill.

Effect.Name: Arcane Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the arcane magic skill.

Effect.Name: Holy Magic Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the holy magic skill.

Effect.Name: Nature Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the nature magic skill.

Effect.Name: Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the mind magic skill.

Effect.Name: Fire Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the fire magic skill.

Effect.Name: Water Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the water magic skill.

Effect.Name: Earth Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the earth magic skill.

Effect.Name: Air Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the air magic skill.

Effect.Name: Mental Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the mental magic skill.

Effect.Name: Divine Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to the divine magic skill.

Effect.Name: Attack
Effect.Description: Causes doer to make their regular combat attack.

Effect.Name: Counterstrike
Effect.Description: Causes doer to make an attack when they are attacked.

Effect.Name: Cleave
Effect.Description: Characters with this ability have a chance to make an extra attack in combat.

Effect.Name: Attack Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus or penalty to hit in combat.

Effect.Name: Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: A bonus to physical damage done in combat. The same type of damage done as the weapon

Effect.Name: Slashing Damage
Effect.Description: Slashing damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Piercing Damage
Effect.Description: Piercing damage to health points

Effect.Name: Blunt Damage
Effect.Description: Blunt damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Fire Damage
Effect.Description: Fire damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Water Damage
Effect.Description: Water damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Hellfire Damage
Effect.Description: Hellfire damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Ice Damage
Effect.Description: Ice damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Acid Damage
Effect.Description: Acid damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Lightning Damage
Effect.Description: Lightning damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Magical Damage
Effect.Description: Magical damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Holy Damage
Effect.Description: Holy damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Unholy Damage
Effect.Description: Unholy damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Poison Damage
Effect.Description: Poison damage to health points.

Effect.Name: Slashing Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus slashing damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Piercing Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus ice damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Blunt Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus lightning damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Fire Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus fire damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Ice Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus ice damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Lightning Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus lightning damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Acid Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus acid damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Energy Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus magical damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Hellfire Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus hellfire damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Holy Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus holy damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Unholy Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus unholy damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Poison Damage Bonus
Effect.Description: Bonus poison damage when the character makes an attack.

Effect.Name: Nassea Bonus
Effect.Description: When the character makes an attack also a chance of nassea.

Effect.Name: Level Drain Bonus
Effect.Description: When the character makes an attack also a chance of level drain.

Effect.Name: Vampiric Bonus
Effect.Description: When the character makes an attack also drains health points.

Effect.Name: Slashing Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Slashing resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Piercing Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Piercing resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Blunt Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Blunt resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Silver Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Resistance bonus or penalty to silver. Werewolves and Wampyri are weak against silver.

Effect.Name: Fire Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Fire resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Water Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Water resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Hellfire Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Hellfire resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Ice Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Ice resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Acid Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Acid resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Lightning Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Lightning resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Magical Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Magical resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Holy Damage
Effect.Description: Holy resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Unholy Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Unholy resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Poison Resistance Bonus
Effect.Description: Poison resistance bonus or penalty.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause fire Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause fire damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause water Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause water damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause nuclear Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause nuclear damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause ice Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause ice damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause acid Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause acid damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause lightning Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause lightning damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause energy Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause energy damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause holy Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause holy damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause unholy Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause unholy damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause poison Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause poison damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause Force Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells cause force damage on top of their normal damage.

Effect.Name: Random Spell
Effect.Description: Causes doer to cast a random spell if they are able.

Effect.Name: Reduce Saving Throw
Effect.Description: Characters spells from the selected spellbook are saved at a penalty due to their power.

Effect.Name: Reduce Resistance
Effect.Description: Characters spells from the selected spellbook that cause damage bypass part of the resistance due to their power.

Effect.Name: Spells Cost Less
Effect.Description: Characters spells from the selected spellbook cost less MP due to their efficiency in that school.

Effect.Name: Spells Cause More Damage
Effect.Description: Characters spells from the selected spellbook cause more damage due to their power.

Effect.Name: Light
Effect.Description: Creates a magical light.

Effect.Name: Darkness
Effect.Description: Causes magical darkness that blinds those without darkvision.

Effect.Name: Darkvision
Effect.Description: Lets the target see in the dark.

Effect.Name: Invisibility
Effect.Description: Causes the target to become invisible.

Effect.Name: True Seeing
Effect.Description: Can see invisible objects, sneaking foes and through magical and normal darkness.

Effect.Name: Contingency
Effect.Description: If the character dies they get auto-ressurected.

Effect.Name: Summon Creature
Effect.Description: Summons a magical creature for a period of time.

Effect.Name: Time Stop
Effect.Description: Caster gets to act alone for a number of seconds.

Effect.Name: Time Travel
Effect.Description: Going back or forward in time.

Effect.Name: Change Sex
Effect.Description: Change character's sex.

Effect.Name: Level Drain
Effect.Description: Causes target to lose levels.

Effect.Name: Disease
Effect.Description: Causes target to become diseased, which causes a number of ailments.

Effect.Name: Fear
Effect.Description: Causes target to be afraid.

Effect.Name: Insanity
Effect.Description: Causes target to be insane.

Effect.Name: Confusion
Effect.Description: Causes target to be confused.

Effect.Name: Sleep
Effect.Description: Attempts to put one or more targets to sleep.

Effect.Name: Nausea
Effect.Description: Each round has a change of debilitating target or making their attacks worthless.

Effect.Name: Silence
Effect.Description: Attempts to make one or more targets unable to cast spells.

Effect.Name: Blind
Effect.Description: Attempts to blind one or more targets.

Effect.Name: Deaf
Effect.Description: Attempts to make deaf one or more targets. Deaf targets have a 50% spellcasting failure rate.

Effect.Name: Curse
Effect.Description: Item cannot be unequipped.

Effect.Name: Stun
Effect.Description: Attempts to stun one or more targets.

Effect.Name: Stasis
Effect.Description: Attempts to put one or more targets in stasis, stunning them and making them immune to harm.

Effect.Name: Calm
Effect.Description: Attempts to calm one or more targets, rendering them unable to attack but otherwise normal.

Effect.Name: Control
Effect.Description: Attempts to control one or more targets.

Effect.Name: Petrification
Effect.Description: Attempts to turn a target to stone.

Effect.Name: Kill
Effect.Description: Attempts to kill one or more targets.

Effect.Name: Drunk
Effect.Description: This is what you get for drinking too much.

Effect.Name: High
Effect.Description: Imbibing substances can really mess you up.

Effect.Name: Immunity to Spells
Effect.Description: Causes target to be immune to spells that are equal or lesser in level to the given value.

Effect.Name: Spell Absorption
Effect.Description: Causes target to be immune to spells that are equal or lesser in level to the given value. Hostile spells restore a characters spell points by their casting cost.

Effect.Name: Spell Shielding
Effect.Description: Stops the next X levels of hostile spells the target would have been hit with.

Effect.Name: Spell Reflection
Effect.Description: Reflects the next X levels of hostile spells the target would have been hit with back to their casters.

Effect.Name: Damage Shielding
Effect.Description: Stops the next X amount of damage the target would have received.

Effect.Name: Fire Shield
Effect.Description: Gives 100% resistance to fire and damages enemies with fiery bursts that attack the user in hand to hand combat.

Effect.Name: Hellfire Shield
Effect.Description: Gives 100% resistance to fire and damages enemies with bursts of hellfire that attack the user in hand to hand combat.

Effect.Name: Acid Shield
Effect.Description: Gives 100% resistance to acid and damages enemies with acidic bursts that attack the user in hand to hand combat.

Effect.Name: Mirror Image
Effect.Description: Creates 1 or more images of the caster, enemies will possible attack the mirror instead of the caster while the effect is running.

Effect.Name: Lingering Song
Effect.Description: Makes the singers songs last longer.

Effect.Name: Dwarve's Poison Resistance
Effect.Description: Dwarves get an extra poison resistance.

Effect.Name: Teleport: Starting Location
Effect.Description: Causes the party to return to the starting point of the adventure.

Effect.Name: Teleport
Effect.Description: Causes the party to teleport to a previously visited location set by the adventure.

Effect.Name: Divine Intervention
Effect.Description: Causes the party to teleport to the nearest church or cathedral.

Effect.Name: Mark
Effect.Description: Causes the party to mark a location for the recall effect to teleport to.

Effect.Name: Recall
Effect.Description: Causes the party to teleport to a previously marked location.

Effect.Name: Feather Fall
Effect.Description: Causes the party to take less damage while falling.

Effect.Name: Levitate
Effect.Description: Can levitate up or down and causes the party to take no damage from falling.

Effect.Name: Fly
Effect.Description: Allows the party to fly.

Effect.Name: Walk on Water
Effect.Description: Group can walk on shallow water.

Effect.Name: Walk on Water
Effect.Description: Group can breath underwater.

Effect.Name: Float
Effect.Description: Group hovers thereby being protected from pit traps.

Effect.Name: Clairvoyance
Effect.Description: Conjures and eagle eye view of the surrounding terrain.

Effect.Name: Create Item
Effect.Description: Creates an item.

Effect.Name: Destroy Item
Effect.Description: Destroys an item.

Effect.Name: Transform
Effect.Description: Transforms an item into another item.

Effect.Name: Convert Item to Gold
Effect.Description: Transforms an item into an amount of gold.

Effect.Name: Remove Effect
Effect.Description: Causes target to lose one effect.

Effect.Name: Read Mind
Effect.Description: Attempts to read the subjects mind.

Effect.Name: Tracking
Effect.Description: Attempts to locate an enemy.

Effect.Name: Equip Item
Effect.Description: Can equip an item they normally couldnt.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Attribute
Effect.Description: Give the character a bonus attribute point.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Feat
Effect.Description: Give the character a bonus feat.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Spell
Effect.Description: Give the character a bonus spell.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus general skill points that can be used for any type of skill point buy.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Combat Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus combat skill points.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Athletics Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus athletics skill points.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Rogue Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus rogue skill points.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Lore Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus lore skill points.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Magic Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus magic skill points.

Effect.Name: Give Bonus Special Skill Points
Effect.Description: Give the character bonus special skill points.

Effect.Name: Truly Skillful
Effect.Description: Allows a character to improve their skills past 100 to 200.

Effect.Name: Truly Amazing
Effect.Description: Allows a character to improve their attributes past 40 to 100.
